Favicon.ico - Website Icon

This page is designated for the website’s favicon icon file, favicon.ico. It icons the browser tab and bookmark representations, ensuring a professional and cohesive visual identity for Shaffer Construction, Inc.

To maintain optimal branding and user experience, the favicon is stored in the root directory of the website and linked within the <head> section of the website’s HTML files.

For additional branding or customization inquiries, please visit our About Us page or Contact Us page for assistance.
